item.description:
OK. Corny title... but fun! ; ) December's Raw Maine potluck will be all about the treats. Got any fun raw vegan alternatives to the usual holiday fare? Bring your favourite and let's share some ideas about how to work the holidays raw vegan style!

Please bring a raw vegan dish to share and come in comfy clothes. Additional guests are welcome! Fresh local spring water, iced and hot herbal tea, dishes, cutlery, etc. will be provided. If you need directions, call or email me.

And there might even be little take-home gifts for all attendees.... xoxo

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Yule Love This Raw Potluck!
